title: Change Scuttlecrab names
body:
Like from the thread here: http://forums.oce.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=466

I propose we change the name of the scuttle crabs to Shazza and Skazza

replies.body: I think when they spawn the announcer should say "THE CRABS ARE UP FOR GRABS!"
wouldnt it be the aussie version of it....so some form of yabby or some such...
who the %%%% calls it that. it sounds %%%%%%ed.
i'd pefer changing it to Taunty
